Paper.Title: Statistics Based Hybrid Approach to Chinese Base Phrase Identification

Section.Paragraph: This paper extends the base noun phrase(BNP) identification into a research on Chinese base phrase identification. ARer briefly introducing some basic concepts on Chinese base phrase, this paper presents a statistics based hybrid model for identifying 7 types of Chinese base phrases in view.
Experiments show the efficiency of the proposed method in simplifying sentence structure. Significance of the research hes in it provides a solid foundation for the Chinese parser.
Keywords: Chinese base phrase identification, parsing, statistical model
